profileAlternative.headline: Full Stack Developer and Professional Explainer
profileAlternative.summary:
Full Stack, independent web developer and designer with a HTML5, Wordpress, CSS and Javascript.

Lead instructor at Hacker You and Ladies Learning Code.

Author of Sublime Text Power User - http://SublimeTextBook.com

Conference Speaker.

If you are interested in getting in touch, please email wes@wesbos.com - linkedin mail is not checked. I'm not looking for any full time roles but am open to remote contracts.

positions.title: Lead Instructor
positions.description: Hands-on, project-based learning from industry-leading professionals.

positions.title: Founder
positions.description: New startup that aggregates all of the group buying deals in your city. Check it out at http://DealPage.ca

positions.title: Capital Markets Application Support
positions.description: Supported multiple applications and databases in the fast pace trading environment.

given.text: Wes is a rare individual who has knowledge of both programming and graphics design. Because of this, he is able to produce highly innovative and functional work. His creativity and his ability to work with others is exceptional.

received.text: Andrew is a down-right whiz at development Never taking shortcuts, ensuring that things are easily adaptable and scalable for the future. He's also an efficient guy, he can see the value in spending a few extra hours on a project in order to save many in the future.

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Global Talent Acquisition / HR Recruiter at GoSecure
Co-Founder & CEO at Canada Learning Code
CEO of Juno (YC S19): a post-graduate coding school that helps you build a fulfilling career as a web developer, fast.
Software Developer at Rangle.io | CTO at Bridge School
Front End Web Developer at Opencare.com
